resources.string:
"ExercisesApp was modified by Roshan.D , to manage your workouts. It is really simple. 
ADDING EXERCISE
 Just choose 'add Exercise' from menu in the bottom and type necessary information about your exercise. When you are not using any weights put '0' there. When you want to change exercise's date, click on current date and set right date by choosing it from calendar. 
GET EXERCISE'S DETAILS
 When you are watching exercises list's page you can click on each exercise and see all informations about it. There is also delete button to remove it."
